ch.artecat.grengine.sources

Class DirBasedSources

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.artecat.grengine.sources.BaseSources
      • ch.artecat.grengine.sources.DirBasedSources
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sources

    public class DirBasedSources
extends BaseSources
    Sources based on a directory with script files.

    Script file extensions and whether to also scan subdirectories is configurable.

    The implementation is basic, but may still be good enough for many use cases in practice: Invisible files, as well as invisible or unlistable directories, are ignored; no attempts are made to detect symlinks.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alain Stalder, Made in Switzerland.
